title.en: Shunji Obata Short Stories: Esper Whirlwind [Complete Edition] + Dark Beast + Skull Gate

altTitles.ja: エスパー大旋風〈完全版〉＋暗黒の野獣　どくろの門　小畑しゅんじ短編集

altTitles.ja-ro: Esper Daisenpuu + Ankoku no Yajuu Dokuro no Mono

altTitles.ja: エスパー大旋風〈完全版〉＋暗黒の野獣　どくろの門　小畑しゅんじ短
小畑しゅんじ短編集 エスパー大旋風

description.en:
Shun Asaoka, a boy who has no sense of exercise and hates vegetables, awakens
to supernatural powers when he eats green peppers for the first time in his life,
and manifests an alter ego with superhuman abilities . Shun 's other self
appears when he is in trouble , and he beats up the delinquents, plays an active role in the baseball team, and becomes the school's hero who charms the girls. Before he knows it, Shun begins to rely on his other self who can do anything ... In addition to the title work "Esper Whirlwind'', "Dark depicts a brother and sister who follow in their father's footsteps behind the lost custom of head-hunting. A total of three short stories from "Mon'' were published in book form for the first time. We want you to enjoy Obata World, which has been revived after more than 30 years!
